channel.title: NRRScape - Join Now! New Server! Great PvM! High Hits!
channel.description:
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=nrrscape.no-ip.org][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/nrrscape.no-ip.org.png[/img][/url]
Forums: http://nrrscape.createaforum.com/index.php
Only temporary forums, just to get players that nee help getting on a way to contact me. Go to forums to download client, No webclient, current a work in progress!
Client Download : [url=http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/jjdveooyqqs7od4/NRRScape%20Client1.1.jar]dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/jjdveooyqqs7od4/NRRScape%20Client1.1.jar[/url] - You need jdk8_25 or jre8_25 to play!
Great PvM, Great Pvp, High Hits, Great Economy, And Much More!! Join Now!
Steps if having trouble with getting client running!
Step One: Download JAR File!
Step Two: Click Run!
Issues? Go to Forums Home Page, and hopefully someone can help you in the chat box.
Pictures Below! :
Pictures at my forums here : [url=http://nrrscape.createaforum.com/client-downloadpictures/client-download-and-other-info!/msg2/#msg2]http://nrrscape.createaforum.com/client-downloadpictures/client-download-and-other-info!/msg2/#msg2[/url]
